thread.title: Does anyone on earth understand the state pension?
thread.title_full: Does anyone on earth understand the state pension?

author: Richard Dyson
title: Does anyone on earth understand the state pension?
text: The new dividend tax: a simple case of taxing the same money twice Does anyone on earth understand the state pension? It's now as complicated as anything in the private sector - and the chance of making a costly mistake has never been greater Photo: Getty Images
